p: Previously, Nitazoxanide was used to treat cryptosporidiosis, giardiasis, and other parasitic infections [ 27]. Recently Nitazoxanide was reported to inhibit various DNA and RNA viruses, including hepatitis B virus (HBV) [ 28, 29], human cytomegalovirus (HCMV) [ 30], influenza A virus [ 31], hepatitis C virus [ 32], norovirus [ 33], rotavirus [ 34], Japanese encephalitis virus (JEV) [ 35], coronavirus [ 36] chikungunya virus (CHIKV) [ 20], human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) [ 37], and ZIKV [ 38].
